# Introduction {.vertical-center background-color=blue}

## What is technology?

Technology is the usage and knowledge of tools, techniques, crafts, systems or methods of organization in order to solve a problem.

. . .

Key drivers for technological advancement:

- Exchange/trade
- Specialization

. . .

Reason for specialization: Save time and money

## Effects of technology

:::{.notes}
The S-curve describes the return (advancement, progress, functionality, etc) on investment (total applied effort, time, money, etc).
:::
